description.0: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.

0.0: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>12%</cryo>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <cryo>100%</cryo> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

1.0: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>15%</cryo>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <cryo>125%</cryo> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

2.0: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>18%</cryo>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <cryo>150%</cryo> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

3.0: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>21%</cryo>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <cryo>175%</cryo> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

4.0: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>24%</cryo>. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals <cryo>200%</cryo> ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.
